mapper.select: select * from (select * from Price where ingreName = #{ingre_name} and priceDate = SYSDATE order by price) where rownum < 11
select * from (select * from Price where ingreName = #{ingre_name} and priceDate = SYSDATE order by priceQuality desc) where rownum < 11
select * from Price where fdQualityIndx is null
select * from Price where ingreName = #{ingre_name} and to_char(priceDate, 'YY/MM/DD') = #{date} order by price desc
select priceDate from Price group by priceDate where ingreName = #{ingre_name}
